title: SDL window can't take any events
body:
by **iLeNsTR**: 
This 1-line patch http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=01acf1dbe91f broke my SDL
program: SDL_PollEvent always return 0, and window can't take any events

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
OS X 10.7.3

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version weekly.2012-03-27 +2d97f35f53e1

Please provide any additional information below.
I can not reproduce this bug on my linux machines
